mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT , G.GRP_NUM , G.GRP_NM , R.USR_TYPE , GET_CODE_NAME('USR_TYPE', R.USR_TYPE) AS USR_TYPE_NM /*나의 회원 유형*/ , G.OPEN_YN , U.USR_NUM , U.USR_ID , U.USR_NM , CASE WHEN R.USR_NICK IS NOT NULL THEN R.USR_NICK ELSE U.USR_NICK END AS USR_NICK , U.DFLT_GRP_NUM FROM USR_INFO U LEFT OUTER JOIN USR_GRP_RLTN R ON U.USR_NUM = R.USR_NUM INNER JOIN GRP_INFO G ON G.GRP_NUM = R.GRP_NUM WHERE G.USE_YN = 'Y' AND R.MBR_APRV_YN = 'Y' AND R.HEAD_APRV_YN = 'Y' AND R.MBR_DEL_YN = 'N' AND U.USR_NUM = #{usrNum} ORDER BY R.REG_DT
